txt.en: Defeat cave-claws and deep-claws in the Pit of Stonejaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Oh, I could use your help, [placeholder]. We Gem-cutters have come to assess the ore and minerals in the Pit of Stonejaws, but this place is crawling with beasts and things look to be difficult. We found some tunnels on the north-eastern side of the Pit of Stonejaws that look rich with veins and precious gems, but they are thick with cave-claws and their deep-claw cousins. Do you think you might spare the time to clear them out for us?'
Tunnels in the north-east side of the Pit of Stonejaws contain many cave-claws and deep-claws.
'Did you clear out those beasts? Good! I have never liked cave-claws, you know. And they seem to be everywhere!\n\n'Now I, Gr치far Splitstone, can get to work doing what I do best!'
Gr치far Splitstone waits to hear about your efforts against the cave-claws.
Defeat cave-claws and deep-claws in the Pit of Stonejaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gr치far Splitstone needs your help clearing out a den of beasts.
